mapper.select: -- 메뉴 count (진행경매/예정경매/전시/아카데미) select S.SALE_NO, COLUMN_JSON(S.TITLE_BLOB) SALE_TITLE_JSON, S.SALE_TH SALE_TH, DATE_FORMAT(S.TO_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') FROM_DT from SALE S where -- S.DEL_YN = 'N' -- and S.WWW_DISP_YN = 'Y' -- and S.SALE_OUTSIDE_YN = 'N' S.REG_DT >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL ${month} MONTH) order by -- S.REG_DT desc S.SALE_NO DESC limit #{offset} , #{size}
select ARTIST_NO, COLUMN_JSON(ARTIST_NAME_BLOB) ARTIST_NAME_BLOB, NATION_CD, BORN_YEAR, DIE_YEAR from ARTIST where ARTIST_NO = #{no} and DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT 1
select CD_ID, CD_NM from CODE where GRP_ID = #{grp_id} order by DISP_ORD
